subject: Wp Last Chance to Claim The Anniversary Offer!
preview: Hi Wp - hope you're well! Rank Math's Limited-Time Anniversary Offer is EXPIRING in less than 20 hours! Here is your last chance to claim a DISCOUNT NEVER OFFERED BEFORE on any of our plans. >> Click

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Wp - hope you're well!

Rank Math's Limited-Time Anniversary Offer is EXPIRING in less than 20 hours!

Here is your last chance to claim a DISCOUNT NEVER OFFERED BEFORE on any of our plans.

>> Click here to grab the PRO version for JUST $49
 (Hurry up! Offer expires in less than 20 hours)

The best thing about the offer is that you get a 30-day no questions asked money back guarantee. Use it for 30 days and if you do not like it, simply tell us, and we will issue a complete refund immediately.

If you haven't checked the PRO version yet, you're missing out on beating your competitor easily:

  • Content AI (have an unfair advantage over your competitors): Helps you write Google-friendly content without getting penalized
  • Schema Generator: Simply put the URL of your competitor or a big site and generate complex Schema in a jiffy without writing anything manually
  • Google Updates Timeline: Monitor all the algorithm updates from Google and stay on top of your site's rankings
  • Rank Tracker & Advanced Google Analytics: Instead of paying 100s of dollars every month to track the performance of your keywords, Rank Math PRO offers you to track the changes in the position of the keywords and stay on top of the game
  • Index Statuses: Getting your content Indexed could never be easier than with Rank Math and also tracking the statuses on Google with no coding at all
  • Google Trends, Video Sitemap, News Sitemap, Video SEO, WooCommerce SEO, Image SEO, Local SEO: - You name it, and Rank Math takes care of all such optimizations automatically
  • Email Reports: Get a birds-eye-view of how your website is performing by getting the reports in your inbox
  • 24x7 Premium Support: We take pride in providing one of the best support systems for any SEO plugin out there
  • Money-Back-Guarantee: We are so sure of our product and services that we offer a No-questions-asked 30-day money-back guarantee. Try our product, support & services and if you are unsure, simply drop an email, and we will refund immediately without asking any questions whatsoever.
  • And more!

>> Click here to grab the PRO version for JUST $49
 (Hurry up! Offer expires in less than 20 hours)

Please stay advised that once the offer is gone, it will expire for everyone, and there will be no exceptions whatsoever.

Any questions? Hit reply to this email, and I'll get back to you right away.

Here's to dominating the search results!

Bhanu Ahluwalia
(Co-Founder, Rank Math SEO Plugin)

Don't want to receive these emails or any future plugin updates? Unsubscribe here
